name: HC Andersen Tale Run
description: Run, swim and jump through the wonderful universe from the fairy tales of Hans Christian Andersen: The Ugly Duckling, The Little Mermaid and The Tinderbox.   -Play as 3 iconic characters, one from each of the fairy tales.   -Run through the duck yard as The Ugly Duckling on a journey to become a beautiful swan.   -Swim in the magical ocean depths, collecting pearls as The Little Mermaid.   -Collect money to appease The Tinderbox Soldier as The Dog with eyes as big as teacups.   -Find magical books to switch between the three fairy tales during the game.   -Swipe left, right, up and down to navigate and avoid obstacles.   -Collect feathers, coins and seashells to increase your score.   -Find three special items to enter each characters unique Frenzy Mode.   -No in-game purchases or links to websites.
